Title: Logan
Plot: In 2029 the mutant population has shrunken significantly due to genetically modified plants designed to reduce mutant powers and the X-Men have disbanded. Logan, whose power to self-heal is dwindling, has surrendered himself to alcohol and now earns a living as a chauffeur. He takes care of the ailing old Professor X whom he keeps hidden away. One day, a female stranger asks Logan to drive a girl named Laura to the Canadian border. At first he refuses, but the Professor has been waiting for a long time for her to appear. Laura possesses an extraordinary fighting prowess and is in many ways like Wolverine. She is pursued by sinister figures working for a powerful corporation; this is because they made her, with Logan's DNA. A decrepit Logan is forced to ask himself if he can or even wants to put his remaining powers to good use. It would appear that in the near-future, the times in which they were able put the world to rights with razor sharp claws and telepathic powers are now over.
Awards: Top Rated Movies #217 | Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 28 wins & 76 nominations.
Writers: James Mangold, Scott Frank, Michael Green, John Romita Sr., Roy Thomas, Len Wein, Herb Trimpe, Mark Millar, Steven McNiven
Stars: Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen, Boyd Holbrook
Companies: Twentieth Century Fox, Marvel Entertainment, TSG Entertainment

Similars.Title: Mad Max: Fury Road
Similars.Plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.
Similars.Stars: Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult

Similars.Title: The Wolverine
Similars.Plot: Wolverine comes to Japan to meet an old friend whose life he saved years ago, and gets embroiled in a conspiracy involving yakuza and mutants.
Similars.Stars: Hugh Jackman, Will Yun Lee, Tao Okamoto

Similars.Title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
Similars.Plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.
Similars.Stars: Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Hugh Jackman

Similars.Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Similars.Plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
Similars.Stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo

Similars.Title: Batman Begins
Similars.Plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
Similars.Stars: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Ken Watanabe

Similars.Title: X-Men: First Class
Similars.Plot: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.
Similars.Stars: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence

Similars.Title: The Dark Knight Rises
Similars.Plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
Similars.Stars: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway

Similars.Title: Jurassic Park
Similars.Plot: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
Similars.Stars: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum

Similars.Title: X-Men: Apocalypse
Similars.Plot: In the 1980s the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive through bringing destruction to the world.
Similars.Stars: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence

Similars.Title: X-Men
Similars.Plot: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.
Similars.Stars: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen

Similars.Title: Deadpool
Similars.Plot: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.
Similars.Stars: Ryan Reynolds, Morena Baccarin, T.J. Miller

Similars.Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
Similars.FullTitle: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 (2011)
Similars.Plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.
Similars.Stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint
